name: Google News Widget
author: Google News Widget

sections.description:
This plugin show a configurable widget for each post with news from Google News about post tags and post categories. Any article will be opened as new tab or window. This plugin tries to engage users inside your blog more time and give to users additional useful information.
More than 5 languages and 14 country editions.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure your widget on the “Appearance | Widgets” page if you want
